products.title: Day & Night Flecked Beige
products.productdescription: Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind. Simply close or open the blind to move the strips to see out, or block yourself in. With their destinctive look, our Day & Night blinds don't just look amazing, but will also give you control over the light entering your room. The unique 2 layered fabric gives this blind a look like no other. Coming from the cassette down, around a bottom bar and back up is what makes this blind work.

products.title: Day & Night Stacked Parchment
products.metadescription: Day & Night Stacked Parchment In its gorgeous silver colour, the Day & Night Stacked Parchment roller blind is ideal for creating a modern theme, with silver and grey being an ever-popular interior design choice. Combining brilliant light control with
products.productdescription: In its gorgeous silver colour, the Day & Night Stacked Parchment roller blind is ideal for creating a modern theme, with silver and grey being an ever-popular interior design choice. Combining brilliant light control with an aesthetic design, it’s a perfect addition to any window. Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind. Simply close or open the blind to move the strips to see out, or block yourself in. With their destinctive look, our Day & Night blinds don't just look amazing, but will also give you control over the light entering your room. The unique 2 layered fabric gives this blind a look like no other. Coming from the cassette down, around a bottom bar and back up is what makes this blind work. All of our blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the British Blind and Shutter Association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.makeitsafe.org.uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with our roller blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you.

products.title: Day & Night Woven Wicker
products.metadescription: Day & Night Woven Wicker With its golden brown tones, the Day & Night Woven Wicker roller blind is a stylish and practical shade. Raffia-brown can be well paired with many colours and has a relaxed feel that works well in bohemian or retro interiors.
products.productdescription: With its golden brown tones, the Day & Night Woven Wicker roller blind is a stylish and practical shade. Raffia-brown can be well paired with many colours and has a relaxed feel that works well in bohemian or retro interiors. products.title: Rift Softshade Sand Day and Night Blind
products.metadescription: Rift Softshade Sand Day and Night Blind in Cream. Made to measure from £35.88 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Day and Night Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Keep your interior looking light and bright with the Rift Softshade Sand Day and Night Roller Blind. Boasting a design of alternating cream fabric and voile strip panels you can enjoy more versatility with your window covering. This design allows for privacy with plenty of natural light, or you can close the blind completely for increased shading when required.
 
 Product ID: DB-VRBX1879 Fabric Colour: Sand Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Brackets     Control Type: Smooth Continuous-Looped Chain Energy Saving Rating: ER1 - Lowest Energy Saving Value - Due to Blind Type or Fabric Light Filtering: Yes
